title: AOC sounds off on Trump-Mamdani meeting as NYC's mayor-elect prepares to take office
text: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez said New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani is prepared to meet with anybody ahead of his meeting with President Donald Trump.
summary: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez said New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani is prepared to meet with anybody ahead of his meeting with President Donald Trump.
source: Latest & Breaking News on Fox News
